languages.text:
For 1 round, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its turn.
This ability removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:

Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its turn.
This ability removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

languages.text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.
languages.original_text:
В течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} кибермастиф может проходить сквозь позиции врагов. При движении он накладывает {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на врагов на соседних клетках.
За каждого такого врага {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} следующей атаки кибермастифа увеличивается на {uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
Применение этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} снимает с кибермастифа {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}.

Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its turn.

languages.text:
Siber mastifin düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilmesini sağlar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Siber mastif, hareket ederken yanından geçtiği bitişikteki düşmanlarda {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} oluşturur.
Etkilenen her düşman, siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sonlanana dek gerçekleştireceği bir sonraki saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığını{/g} +%{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} artırır.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}; siber mastif üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:
Siber mastifin düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilmesini sağlar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Siber mastif, hareket ederken yanından geçtiği bitişikteki düşmanlarda {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} oluşturur.
Etkilenen her düşman, siber mastifin turu sonlanana dek gerçekleştireceği bir sonraki saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığını{/g} +%{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} artırır.
Bu kabiliyet; siber mastif üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

Siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemeden düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilmesini sağlar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Siber mastif, hareket ederken yanından geçtiği bitişikteki düşmanlarda {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} oluşturur.
Etkilenen her düşman, siber mastifin turu sonlanana dek gerçekleştireceği bir sonraki saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığını{/g} +%{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} artırır.
Bu kabiliyet; siber mastif üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

Siber mastifin düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilmesini sağlar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Siber mastif, hareket ederken yanından geçtiği bitişikteki düşmanlarda {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} oluşturur.
Etkilenen her düşman, siber mastifin turu sonlanana dek gerçekleştireceği bir sonraki saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığını{/g} +%{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} artırır.
Bu kabiliyet; siber mastif üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

languages.text:
Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, permite al cibermastín pasar a través de los enemigos. Durante este movimiento, inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveles de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes por los que pase.
Cada enemigo afectado aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} del próximo ataque del cibermastín en un +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} elimina los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} del cibermastín.
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:
Durante 1 asalto, permite al cibermastín pasar a través de los enemigos sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Durante este movimiento, inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveles de hemorragia a todos los enemigos adyacentes por los que pase.
Cada enemigo afectado aumenta la probabilidad de impacto crítico del próximo ataque del cibermastín en un +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % hasta el final de su turno.
Esta capacidad elimina los efectos inmovilizado, derribado y aturdido del cibermastín.

Durante 1 asalto, permite al cibermastín pasar a través de los enemigos. Durante este movimiento, inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveles de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes por los que pase.
Cada enemigo afectado aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} del próximo ataque del cibermastín en un +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % hasta el final de su turno.
Esta capacidad elimina los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} del cibermastín.

languages.text:
一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，生化獒犬可以穿过敌人。生化獒犬在移动过程中，会对移动范围内所有邻近敌人造成{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}级{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。
每个受到此效果影响的敌人都会使生化獒犬下次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%，效果持续至生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会移除生化獒犬身上的{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:
一轮之内，生化獒犬可以穿过敌人，且不会触发借机攻击。生化獒犬在移动过程中，会对移动范围内所有邻近敌人造成{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}级流血效果。
每个受到此效果影响的敌人都会使生化獒犬下次攻击的暴击率提高{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%，效果持续至生化獒犬的回合结束。
此能力会移除生化獒犬身上的定身、倒地、眩晕效果。

一轮之内，生化獒犬可以穿过敌人。生化獒犬在移动过程中，会对移动范围内所有邻近敌人造成{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}级{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。
每个受到此效果影响的敌人都会使生化獒犬下次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%，效果持续至生化獒犬的回合结束。
此能力会移除生化獒犬身上的{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。

languages.text:
Erlaubt dem Cyber-Mastiff 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang, sich durch Gegner zu bewegen. Beim Bewegen belegt er alle angrenzenden Gegner, an denen er vorbeikommt, mit {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
Jeder betroffene Gegner erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} des nächsten Angriffs des Cyber-Mastiffs bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} um +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} %.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} von dem Cyber-Mastiff.
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:
Erlaubt dem Cyber-Mastiff 1 Runde lang, sich durch Gegner zu bewegen. Beim Bewegen belegt er alle angrenzenden Gegner, an denen er vorbeikommt, mit {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
Jeder betroffene Gegner erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} des nächsten Angriffs des Cyber-Mastiffs bis zum Ende seines Zugs um +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} %.
Diese Fähigkeit entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} von dem Cyber-Mastiff.

Erlaubt dem Cyber-Mastiff 1 Runde lang, sich durch Gegner zu bewegen. Beim Bewegen belegt er alle angrenzenden Gegner, an denen er vorbeikommt, mit {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
Jeder betroffene Gegner erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} des nächsten Angriffs des Cyber-Mastiffs bis zum Ende seines Zugs um +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} %.
Diese Fähigkeit entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} von dem Cyber-Mastiff.

Erlaubt dem Cyber-Mastiff 1 Runde lang, sich durch Gegner zu bewegen. Beim Bewegen belegt er alle angrenzenden Gegner, an denen er vorbeikommt, mit {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
Jeder betroffene Gegner erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} des nächsten Angriffs des Cyber-Mastiffs bis zum Ende seines Zugs um +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} %.
Diese Fähigkeit entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} von dem Cyber-Mastiff.

languages.text:
Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, permet au cyber-mastiff de passer à côté des ennemis. Au cours de son déplacement, il inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents à sa trajectoire.
Chaque ennemi affecté augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de la prochaine attaque du cyber-mastiff de +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} subis par le cyber-mastiff.
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:
Pendant 1 round, permet au cyber-mastiff de passer à côté des ennemis sans déclencher d'attaques d'opportunité. Au cours de son déplacement, il inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveaux de Saignement à tous les ennemis adjacents à sa trajectoire.
Chaque ennemi affecté augmente les chances de coup critique de la prochaine attaque du cyber-mastiff de +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
Cette capacité supprime les effets Immobilisation, Paralysie et Étourdissement subis par le cyber-mastiff.

Pendant 1 round, permet au cyber-mastiff de passer à côté des ennemis sans déclencher d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Au cours de son déplacement, il inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents à sa trajectoire.
Chaque ennemi affecté augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de la prochaine attaque du cyber-mastiff de +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
Cette capacité supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} subis par le cyber-mastiff.

Pendant 1 round, permet au cyber-mastiff de passer à côté des ennemis. Au cours de son déplacement, il inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents à sa trajectoire.
Chaque ennemi affecté augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de la prochaine attaque du cyber-mastiff de +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
Cette capacité supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} subis par le cyber-mastiff.

Pendant 1 round, permet au cyber-mastiff de passer à côté des ennemis. Au cours de son déplacement, il inflige {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents à sa trajectoire.
Chaque ennemi affecté augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de la prochaine attaque du cyber-mastiff de +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} % jusqu'à la fin de son tour.
Cette capacité supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} subis par le cyber-mastiff.

languages.text:
1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、サイバーマスチフは敵を通り抜けることができる。移動する際、通過時に隣接するすべての敵に{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を引き起こす。
その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了まで、影響を受けた各敵によって、サイバーマスチフの次の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%上昇する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はサイバーマスチフから{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}を取り除く。
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.

traits.locale_text:
1ラウンドの間、サイバーマスチフは機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく敵を通り抜けることができる。移動する際、通過時に隣接するすべての敵に{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}レベルの出血を引き起こす。
そのターンの終了まで、影響を受けた各敵によって、サイバーマスチフの次の攻撃のクリティカルヒット率が+{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%上昇する。
このアビリティはサイバーマスチフから移動不可、脆弱化、スタンを取り除く。

1ラウンドの間、サイバーマスチフは機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく敵を通り抜けることができる。移動する際、通過時に隣接するすべての敵に{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}レベルの出血を引き起こす。
そのターンの終了まで、影響を受けた各敵によって、サイバーマスチフの次の攻撃のクリティカルヒット率が+{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%上昇する。
このアビリティはサイバーマスチフから移動不可、脆弱化、スタンを取り除く。

1ラウンドの間、サイバーマスチフは機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく敵を通り抜けることができる。移動する際、通過時に隣接するすべての敵に{uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}レベルの出血を引き起こす。
そのターンの終了まで、影響を受けた各敵によって、サイバーマスチフの次の攻撃のクリティカルヒット率が+{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}%上昇する。
このアビリティはサイバーマスチフから移動不可、脆弱化、スタンを取り除く。

languages.text:
В течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} кибермастиф может проходить сквозь позиции врагов. При движении он накладывает {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на врагов на соседних клетках.
За каждого такого врага {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} следующей атаки кибермастифа увеличивается на {uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
Применение этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} снимает с кибермастифа {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}.
languages.original_text:
For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, allows the cyber-mastiff to move through enemies. While moving, it inflicts {uip|Power|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on all adjacent enemies it passes.
Each enemy affected increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of the cyber-mastiff's next attack by +{uip|STR|50df13d6ecfa472aa818147e0a9a2419}% until the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} from the cyber-mastiff.
